task.title: Publishing your DITA content with DITA OT

context.p:
With the help of Oxygen, you can write one file and publish it to multiple output formats, such as:
PDF
DOCX
EPUB
Online help
etc.

steps.stepsection: To make outputs in different formats:

step.stepresult: The Configure transformation scenario(s) window opens.

step.cmd: Select all transformations you want to associate with the Oxygen project and click Apply associated.
step.stepresult: The chosen transformations will be applied to the current project.
